title: Moltbot Gateway (single instance)
description: Deploy one Moltbot/Clawdbot gateway instance (use unique host ports + unique config/workspace directories per instance).
stackfile:
services:
  moltbot-gateway:
    image: ${CLAWDBOT_IMAGE}
    container_name: ${STACK_NAME:-moltbot}-gateway
    init: true
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      HOME: /home/node
      TERM: xterm-256color
      CLAWDBOT_GATEWAY_TOKEN: ${CLAWDBOT_GATEWAY_TOKEN}
      CLAUDE_AI_SESSION_KEY: ${CLAUDE_AI_SESSION_KEY:-}
      CLAUDE_WEB_SESSION_KEY: ${CLAUDE_WEB_SESSION_KEY:-}
      CLAUDE_WEB_COOKIE: ${CLAUDE_WEB_COOKIE:-}
    volumes:
      - ${CLAWDBOT_CONFIG_DIR}:/home/node/.clawdbot
      - ${CLAWDBOT_WORKSPACE_DIR}:/home/node/clawd
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:${HOST_GATEWAY_PORT}:18789"
      - "127.0.0.1:${HOST_BRIDGE_PORT}:18790"
    command:
      - node
      - dist/index.js
      - gateway
      - --bind
      - lan
      - --port
      - "18789"
